metadata.title: CVE-2020-23109 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow vulnerability in function convert_colorspace inheif_colorconversion.cc in libheif v1.6.2, allows attackers to cause adenial of service and disclose sensitive information, via a crafted HEIFfile.

criterions.comment: libheif package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
